Transcript: Chris: Hello. I got your test results back. Very, very interesting.
Gabriela: You have no idea how interesting I am.
Chris: You keep saying that. What's it like?

Gabriela: What, to be a vampire? All my senses are heightened -- everything I 
see, smell, taste, feel. It makes sex incredible.
Chris: I bet. Of course, I'm not really a neck man.
Gabriela: I feel wild and invincible, like no one can stop me.
Chris: Seems I have.

Gabriela: For now. But when I get out of here, I'll have total power in every 
way imaginable. And you could, too, Chris. Isn't that what you've always wanted?

Frank: Hey, so, when's your next break? I found a cozy little stairwell over 
here, built for two.

Orderly: Is this the earring that you were looking for, Dr. Wexler? I found 
it on the supply closet floor.
Karen: Thanks, Ed.
Frank: Wonder how it got there.
Karen: You know, we have to stop sneaking around like teenagers.
Frank: Hey, can I help it if I'm crazy about you?
Ian: Karen?
Karen: Oh, my God, Eve!
Eve: It's my baby!
Karen: What happened?
Ian: She's having contractions, I think.
Eve: It's too soon, Karen. Too soon.
Karen: Ok, let's get her on here.
Ian: All right. All right.
Karen: It's probably Braxton-Hicks.
Eve: You don't know that.
Karen: Ok, we'll run some tests, and I'm sure there's nothing to worry about.

Eve: Karen, don't patronize me! I know what's going on here. I know what's 
happening. I'm losing my baby. I'm losing my baby.
Kevin: Can't this plane go any faster?
Lucy: Hey, we are going to get to Livvie. Jack is probably already there.
Kevin: Jack vaporized into thin air. That's not exactly comforting.

Lucy: Well, it is in a way because I think Jack's love for Livvie transported 
him to her side.

Kevin: Well, then I wish he would have taken us with him. Lucy, I'm scared to 
death that we won't be in time to save my daughter.

Abe: As the sun dies and the mists of night rises, sweet children, my honor 
and duty and pleasure it is to join these fated souls as willing wife and 
husband through this life and many lives and generations which will follow. If 
there be anyone who would object to this union, speak now or --
Jack: Livvie! Livvie!
Livvie: Jack.
Caleb: Jack, you mind? We're kind of in the middle of a wedding here.
Jack: Party's over, Caleb.

Caleb: I'm sorry, sweetheart. Would you mind going upstairs while I handle 
this little mess?
Livvie: Why? Caleb, why can't I stay?

Jack: Because he can't kill me in your presence. And you will have to kill me 
because I'm not leaving here without Livvie.
Karen: Well, everything looks fine, Eve. You're going to be just fine.
Eve: Stop saying that.

Karen: No, I won't because you are going to be just fine. I'm just going to 
run this to the lab, ok?
Eve: That's not going to help.
Ian: Calm down.
Eve: But she doesn't know anything. She doesn't know what's going on.
Ian: I know, I know.
Karen: You know, great doctors always make lousy patients.
Eve: This -- this is what he wants. And you know what else he wants.
Karen: Who are you talking about?

Eve: You really want to know? I'll tell you. There's a vampire in Port 
Charles.
Karen: Well, every town has its bloodsuckers.
Eve: I'm not kidding you, Karen. He's as real as I am.
Karen: Did you give her a sedative?

Ian: I had the same reaction. Until I saw proof. The vampire is the brother 
of the man who married us.
Karen: Ok, guys, this isn't funny.
Ian: Who's laughing, Karen? I saw Jack's fangs and the damage that was done.
Karen: Whoa, wait a minute. Jack Ramsey?

Ian: Yeah. He was attacked, and now he's one of them. Who knows how many 
others are out there.
Eve: Why would we lie about this? Caleb is real.
Karen: Did you say Caleb? That's the name of the man Gabby's seeing.

Eve: He's not a man. Karen, he's an it. He's a vampire. Listen to me, Karen. 
He can't have children of his own, so he wants my baby. He wants our son. Don't 
let him take our son away from us. Don't let him take my baby.

Kevin: But we just found each other, Lucy. I mean, there's still so much I 
want to do with her, so much I still have to say to her.

Lucy: I know. Come here, sit down. You've got to stop this. This isn't doing 
you any good, and it's certainly not doing Livvie any good at all. You know what 
you always tell me? You cannot beat yourself up over things you cannot control. 
So stop it.

Kevin: But I should have seen this coming. There should have been something 
that I could have done.

Lucy: Oh, like what? You know, most dads of teenage daughters deal with maybe 
tattooed bikers or maybe even some drug-beat, deadbeat kind of guy, but, no, not 
you. Doc, you're dealing with a vampire. How in the world could you have seen 
this coming?
Kevin: Maybe if I was more vigilant, maybe then I could have protected her.

Lucy: No, no, you've been very vigilant. You've done everything you can 
possibly do. And she knows how much you care and how much you love her.
Kevin: You think so?
Lucy: Yes.
Kevin: You think I've told her that enough?

Lucy: Yeah, I do. I don't want you to worry because I think you're going to 
have plenty of time to tell her as many times as you want to because -- I don't 
know why, but somehow in my heart I just know that this is all going to work 
out. It's going to be ok.
Kevin: Why is this taking so damn long?

Livvie: You know how difficult this must be for Jack. I should talk to him 
alone.
Jack: Yeah, good idea.
Caleb: I'm not leaving you alone with him.
Livvie: Hey, I trusted you, Caleb. I'm just asking for you to trust me.
Caleb: I won't be far.

Jack: Livvie, listen to me. I've come to take you home. If you stay with 
Caleb, you're going to lose your life.

Livvie: I know exactly who Caleb is and what he's planning to do. Jack, I'm 
going to be reborn into this wonderful world.

Jack: No, no, no. He's tricked you. His world is not an eternal peace. It's 
an eternal hell. Hell on earth.
Livvie: You don't know that, Jack.
Jack: Yes, I do. Caleb made me like him -- a vampire.
Livvie: You're one?

Jack: Yes. And that's why I was so afraid to be with you. Remember when I 
pushed you away? Livvie, I was scared that I might do something to you, that I 
might hurt you. And that's why I did that. I couldn't stand it.
Livvie: So all this time, you knew.

Jack: I wanted you so bad. My body ached for you, but I was so scared of 
losing control and turning into this beast like him.
Livvie: You kept something this important a secret?

Jack: No, no, no, Livvie. I tried telling you, but when I saw that look on 
your face when I said that word "vampire" -- I couldn't stand to see you look at 
me that way, with that disgust and that hate. Not when I've seen the love in 
your eyes. Please say something. Please. Anything. Say something.

Livvie: That's the difference between you and Caleb. He made me understand so 
I wouldn't be afraid.

Jack: No, no. Listen to yourself. Those are not your words. Caleb has you so 
far in his spell.

Livvie: Think what you like, Jack, and whatever helps you get through this. 
But you're my past. And Caleb -- he's my future. I'm sorry.

Gabriela: I know you've got it, Chris. An insatiable appetite, a lust for 
power.
Chris: Problem with that is --

Gabriela: You always get so close to it -- real power -- but it always just 
seems to elude you. But I can give you the power that you've never dreamed of.
Chris: Go on.

Gabriela: Well, when you have other blood in you -- my blood -- you'll be so 
much stronger. You've always had to fight to get on top, fight to stay on top. 
Well, I can give you the kind of power that no one can take away from you -- 
eternal power.
Chris: It would be like discovering the fountain of youth.

Gabriela: And skinny-dipping in it. You know, you and I would make an 
incredible team.
Chris: I usually work alone.

Gabriela: But I can watch your back, and you can watch me. Turn these off and 
let me turn you on -- to the kind of power that you can only imagine. Right 
here, right now. Let me show you what I can do for you. A forbidden pleasure 
you've never had. A thrill you've never tasted. All you have to do is open your 
mind, Chris, and open this cage.
Karen: This vampire stuff is a little hard to swallow, Eve.

Eve: Well, when you're staring into glowing eyes and shiny fangs, you believe 
it fast.
Ian: Apparently Caleb has these superhuman powers.

Eve: And he's trying to take my baby. That's why I'm having these pains, 
Karen. He wants my baby!

Ian: We don't know for sure that what happened to you has anything to do with 
Caleb.
Eve: Yes, we do.
Ian: No.
Eve: Just the fact that he could hurt this child makes me sick.
Ian: Ok, ok.
Eve: It makes me sick.
Ian: I'm going to protect you and the child. I told you that. Just relax.

Karen: I'm going to run the blood to the lab and get it tested. For now just 
take it easy, ok?
Ian: It's ok.
Frank: Hey, how's Eve?
Karen: This sounds so bizarre, but I think I believe them.
Frank: What's wrong?

Karen: Ok, here goes. Ian and Eve think there's a vampire after their son and 
that he bit Jack, who's now one, too, and that explains why things have been so 
crazy around here.

Frank: I was about to say that is ridiculous, but after what we've 
experienced --

Karen: And there's more. This head vampire guy's name is Caleb. Ring any 
major bells?
Frank: Gabby's boyfriend? The guy who turned her head and maybe the rest --
Karen: Yeah, do you think all this is true?

Frank: Well, Gabby and Jack have been acting strange. And lately I have 
hauled in a few bodies minus their blood.
Karen: Well, it would explain Jack's incredible strength.

Frank: And why we found Gabby alone with Emilio after he was attacked. Maybe 
--

Karen: Gabby attacked Emilio. And if she did and this is true, then Emilio 
could be one, too.
Frank: Ok, I'm going to put security in Emilio's room right now.

Karen: Good idea. Frank -- Frank, just don't be alone with him, ok? Just in 
case.
Frank: Yeah, I won't. You watch your back, too.

Eve: Michael said this necklace would protect our baby against Caleb. Why am 
I getting these pains? Why isn't it working? Why isn't it working?
Livvie: I think you better go.

Jack: No. No, I'm not going anywhere without you. You don't love Caleb. It's 
a power he has over you, that's all.
Livvie: No, Jack, you don't know what I feel.

Jack: I know that I love you and that somewhere in your heart, you love me, 
too.
Livvie: It's Caleb I love. I'm marrying Caleb.

Jack: Caleb -- Livvie, he's planted all of these emotions inside your head. 
He's put a picture of this fairy tale life in there, and it's not real. Not like 
what we have.
Livvie: No, had, Jack. It's in the past.

Jack: You're wrong. You know, going through good times, Livvie, and bad times 
together -- that's what's real. Our fights. Our mistakes we made, Livvie. Our 
passion. Our passion that we have is something that you can't describe, and I 
know that you know that. I know you know that's real.
Livvie: But, Jack, I mean, it wasn't easy.
Jack: That's the point. That it wasn't this perfect plan like Caleb has.
Livvie: So what are you saying?

Jack: I'm saying that when we knew we loved each other, when I would hold you 
in my arms, you wanted to be there. You chose me. Livvie, you wanted me.
Livvie: But I -- Jack, I chose Caleb.
Jack: No.
Livvie: Ok?

Jack: No, that's what he's made you believe. He chose you, though. He lured 
you into his sick little trap.

Caleb: Don't listen to him, Olivia. Jack's the one trying to brainwash you 
with these memories from your past. That's all they are -- memories.
Jack: Get away from her.

Caleb: I'm the one you want, Olivia. Isn't that right? It's me. There. She 
told you who she wants. Now get out, and I'll spare your miserable life.
Jack: I'm not going anywhere without Livvie.
Caleb: Then try and take her from me.
Livvie: No, Jack! Jack? Jack, are you all right?

Caleb: Remember, Olivia, he's your past. I'm your future. Come here. Look at 
me. Look into my eyes. You see how much love I have for you?
Livvie: Yes, I do.
Jack: Livvie, don't listen to him. Don't!

Caleb: Remember how much you wanted to be my wife? How you wanted to live 
with me through the ages?
Livvie: Yes, I do. I'm yours, Caleb. I'm here.
Jack: Livvie --
Caleb: I'll get the judge, Olivia. We'll continue our ceremony.
Livvie: In front of Jack?
Caleb: Hmm. Jack. He can watch. Let him see true love.
Jack: No. No, don't give in to him, Livvie. Don't.
Livvie: Caleb, please, just let him go.

Caleb: It's for his own good, sweetheart. He needs to see with his own eyes 
what we mean to each other. Only then will he believe it.
Livvie: Yes, for his own good.
Caleb: It's time to be man and wife.
Kevin: Over my dead body.
Gabriela: Come on, Chris. I know you want it so bad.
Chris: I do.

Gabriela: Then just take one step closer, and you'll have the power of taking 
or giving life.

Chris: I don't think so. You thought you had me, didn't you? That taking or 
giving life -- what are you talking about? I'm a doctor. I already have that 
job.
Gabriela: There are so many things that you can't do.

Chris: Of course. Like be a bloodsucking freak? I've stooped pretty low in my 
time, Gabby, but I do draw a line in certain places.
Gabriela: You don't know what you're missing.

Chris: Oh, look, to me, you're just a sexy science experiment, ok, who's 
going to make me hundreds and hundreds of millions of dollars.
Gabriela: No. You want me. I can tell.

Chris: Don't they teach modesty at vampire school? Button yourself up. I'm 
sleeping alone tonight. No midnight snack for you.
Karen: Good news. All the preliminary tests we've done came back normal.
Ian: Thank God. I can't wait to tell Eve that everything's fine.

Karen: Well, I didn't say that. All the tests we've done so far show there's 
nothing physically wrong with Eve, which means it's all in her head, Ian, and 
that could be just as dangerous for her and the baby.
[Music plays]
Caleb's Voice: There, baby. Daddy's got you. Daddy's got you.
Eve's Voice: Damn you, Caleb! Leave my son alone!
Kevin: You leave my daughter alone.
Caleb: I'd swear you weren't on the guest list.
Kevin: Livvie, move away from him. Right now!
Lucy: Doc!

Kevin: Lucy, stay there! Get back! Jack -- Jack, take Livvie, get out of

Jack: He'll kill you if Livvie's not in the room.
Kevin: Just do what I tell you to do! Get out of here! Go!
Livvie: This is my wedding day!
Kevin: Lucy, go! Get out!
Caleb: Oh, Dad -- can I call you Dad? You just messed with the wrong vampire.
>> On the next "Port Charles" --
Eve: He's going to take our son. Ian, he wants our baby.

Lucy: Nothing is going to happen to Kevin. I'm going to make sure of it. I'm

Jack: No! Don't go!
Livvie: No, I'm coming with you!

Caleb: So, what do you say, Dad? Aren't you going to welcome me to the
